references: _James Propp_, posting to math-fun mailing list May 30 1997.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: f[n_] := Sum[(-1)^k*x^(2*k + 1)/(2*k + 1)!, {k, 0, n}]; a[n_] := (CountRoots[f[n], x] - 1)/2; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 62}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 16 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
